Comments_List: An overall view of inner stereotypes, discrimination and discrepancy of a film

I learned a lot about film, as I've ever taken a film studies class before!
I also got comfortable unpacking the various layers within a film. I feel confident going forward that I could analyze a scene or movie adequately.

I gained an understanding of important through lines in the history of American film musicals. This course also enabled me to access a greater awareness of the complexity of each film we examined, in regards to the film's context, production, and reception.
I got to know American musicals made in 19th century and 20th century, and also their relationships with social environments and historical events happened during that period of time.
The discussion is so fabulous, encouraging everyone to express themselves freely. Also, there is no right or wrong, making us to think more and individually.

Strengths: Great discussion
Improvements: sometimes discussions could feel a bit broad
I wish there were more opportunities for critical writing. I also think there's room in the course for animated films and/or Disney movies, and wish we hadn't skipped right from Elvis to La La Land.

The atmosphere of the class was very active and relaxing because there were lots of discussions and clip demonstrations included in the courser. As a result, I did not feel exhausted after taking part in the course.
Sure. This opens a all-new world to me and sheds light on my film appreciation ability.
Yes! You'll never look at musicals the same way again

Yes! It was a really interesting and exciting course. Our discussions made three hour long classes fly by. We got to look at classic movies in a new light, and were provided with ample background information to aid our in-depth analyses. It's intriguing to pick a film apart and identify all of its flaws, nuances, and triumphs.

Sure. Getting better knowledges about musicals is beneficial for our reading and critical thinking skills. Also, it provided us with more background sources when we learnt about the history of certain eras.
